oslab_utils.config.config_fill_auto¶

oslab_utils.config.config_fill_auto(config, working_directory=None)[source]¶

This function fills placeholders in the configuration data with auto-generated values.

Args:

config (dict): The configuration data to be processed. working_directory (str, optional): The directory where the git repository is located.

Defaults to the current working directory.

Returns:

dict: The configuration data with placeholders replaced with auto-generated values.

Note:

This function uses the oslab_utils.git_utils module to get the git hash and commit message. The placeholders filled are: <git_hash>, <commit_message>, <me>, <yyyymmdd>, <today>, and <time>.
